PRESTIGE CLASSES

상위직 offer a new form of multiclassing. Unlike the basic classes, characters must meet 필요조건 before they can take their first 레벨 of a prestige class. The rules for 레벨 성장 apply to this system, meaning the first step of 성장 is always choosing a class. If a character does not meet the 필요조건 for a prestige class before that first step, that character cannot take the first 레벨 of that prestige class.  Taking a prestige class does not incur the experience point penalties normally associated with multiclassing.
